name: vue-business-hours
description: Vue component for selecting business hours.
author: sbarry50

scripts.build: npm run build:all && npm run build:rename-es
scripts.build:all: cross-env VUE_CLI_BUILD_TARGET=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --name VueBusinessHours --dest dist --formats commonjs,umd,umd-min src/entry.js
scripts.build:umd: cross-env VUE_CLI_BUILD_TARGET=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --name VueBusinessHours --dest dist --formats umd src/entry.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env VUE_CLI_BUILD_TARGET=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --name VueBusinessHours --dest dist --formats commonjs src/entry.js && mv dist/VueBusinessHours.common.js dist/VueBusinessHours.esm.js
scripts.build:unpkg: cross-env VUE_CLI_BUILD_TARGET=lib vue-cli-service build --target lib --name VueBusinessHours --dest dist --formats umd-min src/entry.js
